sentences.sentence: The newspaper withdrew the allegations the next day.
sentences.translation: 这家报纸第二天收回了这些说法。

sentences.sentence: She withdrew because she did not wish to split the Liberal vote.
sentences.translation: 她退出是因为不想分散自由党的选票。

sentences.sentence: "Perhaps it would be better if I withdrew altogether."—"Certainly not!"
sentences.translation: “我完全退出的话情况或许会好些。” — “当然不是。”
